revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nokia |model=G-240W |revision=-F |fcc_date=10/22/2016 |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router, fiber gateway, ONT |fcc_id=2ADZRG240WFV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=EcoNet |cpu1_model=EN7526GT;ECONET, EN7526GT, 1639-ACTH, CCNK01L6, OTPBAS11; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7592 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=2.4GHz FEM;RFMD;RFFM4252;;2; ,,, VoIP Chip;Microsemi;LE9641;;1; |flags=GPON, VoIP, TR-069, |stock_boot=U-Boot |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=userAdmin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' }} {{TagLine|7368 Intelligent Services Access Manager ONT}}
The [[EcoNet]] EN7526GT CPU (as labeled in the [https://fccid.io/2ADZRG240WFV2/Internal-Photos/Internal-photos-3613425 FCC photos]) may be a [[MediaTek]] :MTK7526G (seen in a screenshot of the Web interface in the User Manual).
The 2.4GHz radio is probably 2x2:2, but FCC documents only say "MIMO".
:See also [http://koolshare.cn/thread-122677-1-1.html Bell] [http://koolshare.cn/thread-121156-1-1.html G-140W-C] ([[Gemtek]]) and [http://bbs.mydigit.cn/read.php?tid=2193315&page=4 HG6821M] ([[MitraStar]])..
